item.title: Amy add a quote by Julie Garwood
item.description: "When you brush your teeth, I'll squeeze the toothpaste." -- Julie Garwood

item.title: Amy add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "Praise not the day until evening has come, a woman until she is burnt, a sword until it is tried, a maiden until she is married, ice until it has been crossed, beer until it has been drunk." -- Michael Crichton

item.title: Amy add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amy add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: Amy add a quote by Miss Piggy
item.description: "Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye." -- Miss Piggy

item.title: Amy add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "Every atom of your flesh is as dear to me as my own: in pain and sickness it would still be dear." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Amy add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Anon, who wrote so many poems without signing them, was often a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: Amy add a quote by Desmond Tutu
item.description: "Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world." -- Desmond Tutu
